Professional experience

Reyesoft

Web Developer - Scrum master

I joined Reyesoft as a Web Developer in the Front End team. At this company, I learnt about Agile methodologies, to the point of becoming Scrum Master. Besides working in the Front End team, I developed Desktop apps and API REST. This experiece has provided me great skills and tools as a professional developer, such as QA, DevOps y Scrum.

Freelance

Web Developer and SEO Writer

As freelancer, I have developed sites and software solutions using different frameworks and languages such as Python, Angular and Wordpress. I have also worked as a SEO writer in sites like EncuentraPrecios.es, Movical, descargar.mobi and MundoBurpee.

Ouroboros

Textile Startup

Ouroboros is startup focused on sports and workwear design and production. This project helped me to develop my leadership, self-management and projection skills.

Raffeish

Seller and Tour Guide

Working as a seller and tour guide in Valle Grande helped me to develop my social skills.

QTI

Seller

I worked as a sales representative in a QTI branch shop selling imported products.
